@All
Please remember to follow ALL instructions listed in the "INSTALLING INSRUCTIONS.txt" file.

You do not need to enter a key, as Step 2 will take care of this for you.

Once you have installed Photoshop as a trial version, all you have to do is copy your respective .dll into the proper folder. For 32-bit, it goes into this folder:
C:Program Files (x86)AdobeAdobe Photoshop CS6
For 64-bit, it goes into:
C:Program FilesAdobeAdobe Photoshop CS6

IF you are on 64-bit, copy the 32-bit dll into the 32-bit folder also, as you have both the 32-bit and 64-bit versions of Photoshop installed. DO NOT OPEN PHOTOSHOP YET.

Download the torrent listed in the Instructions file. (Adobe Tool 2.1)

Run Adobe Tool 2.1, run "Check Hosts", then click on "Patch".

You're done! You may now run Photoshop.
I haven't had 1 problem with your files, keep doing what you are doing, and I will keep downloading from you if you have what I am looking for!
